page.title: 08HOUSING DEVELOPMENT
page.content: HOUSING DEVELOPMENT THE NORTHLANDS WOOD HOUSING ESTATE HAS DEVELOPED OVER THE LAST 10 YEARS IN 4 DISTINCT STAGES INVOLVING 4 BUILDING DEVELOPERS. THE FIRST STAGE FROM LEWES ROAD AND DOWN NORTHLANDS AVENUE IS A SANDERSON DEVELOPMENT. BOVIS HOMES COMPLETED THE SECOND STAGE. THE THIRD STAGE HOUSES ARE TIMBER FRAMED,BUILT BY RUSH AND TOMKINS AND THE FINAL STAGE IS THE FOREST FIELDS DEVELOPMENT BEING BUILT BY CLARKE HOMES. HOUSE PRICES ON THE FOREST FIELDS DEVELOPMENT: 2 BEDROOMED FLATS FROM 27,000POUNDS 1 " " TERRACED HOUSE FROM 29,000POUNDS 3BEDROOMED SEMI DETACHED 63,000_68000POUNDS HOUSE BUYERS ARE MAINLY COMMUTERS, MAINLY WORKING AT GATWICK AIRPORT.MOST FAMILIES OWN 2 CARS ; FEW AMENITIES,
